New Records: Lewandowski is only the third player to score in four successive EUROs (2012, 2016, 2020, 2024) after Luka Modrić and Cristiano Ronaldo (five)
Key Match Events: Mbappé finally got off the mark at EURO finals with a penalty kick
Lewandowski levelled the score with a penalty kick
Łukasz Skorupski denied France with six excellent saves
Pre-Game Insights: There is no pre-game insight in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Skorupski focusing on positives after Poland exit
Michał Probierz, Poland coach: 'I want to thank the fans for turning out today despite us being eliminated'
Miscellaneous Highlights: France have not won their final group match in any of their last nine major tournaments
France are through to the knockout phase for the seventh time in the last eight EUROs
N'Golo Kanté has never lost a match in regulation time at a major finals, his run of 18 games (W12 D6) a record for a European player
Others: France will face the Group E runner-up in the round of 16 on July 1st in Düsseldorf
